foreignData.name: 灯の再覚醒、オブ・ニクシリス
foreignData.text:
＋１：あなたはカードを１枚引き、あなたは１点のライフを失う。
－３：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
－８：対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは「プレイヤー１人がカードを１枚引くたび、あなたは２点のライフを失う。」を持つ紋章を得る。
foreignData.type: プレインズウォーカー — ニクシリス

mainBoard.name: Ob Nixilis Reignited
mainBoard.originalText:
+1: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
−3: Destroy target creature.
−8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

rulings.text: The emblem created by Ob Nixilis Reignited’s last ability is both owned and controlled by the target opponent. In a multiplayer game, if you own Ob Nixilis Reignited and use him to give one of your opponents an emblem, the emblem remains even if you leave the game.

mainBoard.text:
[+1]: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
[−3]: Destroy target creature.
[−8]: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a player draws a card, you lose 2 life."

mainBoard.flavorText: "Later we will mourn those we have lost. First we must end their suffering." —Drana, Kalastria bloodchief

foreignData.flavorText:
「亡くした者を嘆くのは後。彼らの苦痛を終わらせるのが先です。」
――カラストリアの血の長、ドラーナ
foreignData.name: 捕らわれの宿主
foreignData.text: 捕らわれの宿主が死亡したとき、無色の１/１のエルドラージ・末裔・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。それは「このクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに{C}を加える。」を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼

mainBoard.name: Carrier Thrall
mainBoard.originalText: When Carrier Thrall dies, put a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."

rulings.text: Eldrazi Scions are similar to Eldrazi Spawn, seen in the Zendikar block. Note that Eldrazi Scions are 1/1, not 0/1.
Eldrazi and Scion are each separate creature types. Anything that affects Eldrazi will affect these tokens, for example.
Sacrificing an Eldrazi Scion creature token to add {C} to your mana pool is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to.

Some instants and sorceries that create Eldrazi Scions require targets. If all targets for such a spell have become illegal by the time that spell tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t get any Eldrazi Scions.

mainBoard.text: When Carrier Thrall dies, create a 1/1 colorless Eldrazi Scion creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."

foreignData.name: 異臭のインプ
foreignData.text:
飛行
{B}：ターン終了時まで、異臭のインプは接死を得る。（これが何らかのダメージをクリーチャーに与えたら、それだけで破壊する。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — インプ

Flying

Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

mainBoard.text:
Despoiler of Souls can't block.
{B}{B}, Exile two other creature cards from your graveyard: Return Despoiler of Souls from your graveyard to the battlefield.

mainBoard.flavorText: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

foreignData.flavorText: インプは自分の体臭には気がついていないので、元気を取り戻すために立ち止まって息を深く吸い込んだ……。そしてたちまち死んでしまった。

When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

mainBoard.text: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.

foreignData.name: 冒涜の悪魔
foreignData.text:
飛行
各戦闘の開始時に、いずれの対戦相手もクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げてもよい。いずれかのプレイヤーがそうしたなら、冒涜の悪魔をタップし、これの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

mainBoard.name: Desecration Demon
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: Players won’t know which player or planeswalker Desecration Demon will attack, if any, when deciding whether to sacrifice a creature.

Each opponent in turn order may choose to sacrifice a creature, even if an opponent already chose to sacrifice a creature that combat. Desecration Demon will have a maximum of one +1/+1 counter put on it each combat, no matter how many creatures were sacrificed.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

mainBoard.flavorText: Setting foot in their muck is an open invitation.

foreignData.flavorText: あのぬかるみに足を踏み入れるのは「ご自由にお召し上がりください」と言うようなものだ。
foreignData.name: 押し潰すヒル
foreignData.text: 押し潰すヒルのパワーとタフネスは、それぞれあなたがコントロールする沼の総数に等しい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ヒル

mainBoard.name: Squelching Leeches
mainBoard.originalText: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: Squelching Leeches’s power and toughness will change as the number of Swamps you control changes. Its ability counts all lands you control with the subtype Swamp, not just those named Swamp.
The ability that defines Squelching Leeches’s power and toughness works in all zones, not just the battlefield.

mainBoard.text: Squelching Leeches's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

mainBoard.flavorText: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

foreignData.flavorText: 提供した奉仕の対価として、苦悩の約束は十分すぎるほどである。
foreignData.name: 寛大な拷問者
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーがクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げるか３点のライフを支払わないかぎり、あなたはカードを１枚引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — デーモン

mainBoard.name: Indulgent Tormentor
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

rulings.text: The opponent chooses whether they sacrifice a creature, pays 3 life, or allows you to draw a card. That player can’t make an impossible choice, such as sacrificing a creature while they control no creatures.

If there are no legal targets to choose, perhaps because all your opponents have hexproof, the ability is removed from the stack with no effect. You won’t draw a card. This is also true if the target opponent becomes an illegal target in response to the ability.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Some will sacrifice everything for but a taste of power.

foreignData.flavorText: 力を味わうためだけに、すべてを犠牲にする者もいる。

mainBoard.text: Each player sacrifices a creature.

mainBoard.name: Mire's Toll
mainBoard.originalText: Target player reveals a number of cards from his or her hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

rulings.text: If the number of Swamps you control exceeds the number of cards in the targeted player’s hand, that player reveals all the cards in their hand.

mainBoard.text: Target player reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of Swamps you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

mainBoard.flavorText: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.

foreignData.flavorText: 自分たちの世界がどれほどの死者の積み重ねで形づくられているか、命ある者の中にそれを知る者はほとんどいない。
foreignData.name: 不気味な発見
foreignData.text:
以下から１つまたは両方を選ぶ。
• あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
• あなたの墓地から土地・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。

mainBoard.name: Grim Discovery
mainBoard.originalText:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
mainBoard.text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

foreignData.flavorText: 幾ばくかを取り去れば、反逆が起こりえる。全てを取り去れば、抑圧も宿命として受け入れられる。
foreignData.name: 小悪疫
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、１点のライフを失い、カード１枚を捨て、クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げ、土地１つを生け贄に捧げる。

mainBoard.name: Smallpox
mainBoard.originalText: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

rulings.text: Each player loses 1 life. Then, starting with the active player and proceeding in turn order, each player chooses a card to discard (normally without seeing what other players have chosen) and all discards happen simultaneously. Then, starting with the active player and proceeding in turn order, each player chooses a creature to sacrifice (this time players can see what other players have chosen) and all sacrifices happen simultaneously. Then the process that happened for creatures is repeated for lands.

mainBoard.text: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier." —Ob Nixilis

foreignData.flavorText:
「つまるところ最初の世界の征服が最も困難である。他の世界へと移り、次の征服をより容易にするものを手に入れていくことで、我の力は増大していった。」
――オブ・ニクシリス

mainBoard.text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

mainBoard.name: Altar's Reap
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.

mainBoard.flavorText: "One little word was all it took. The world shook as I said it. The doom of Zendikar was here at last." —Ob Nixilis

foreignData.flavorText:
「たったの一言で事足りた。その一言に世界が揺らいだ。ついにゼンディカーに破滅が到来したのだ。」
――オブ・ニクシリス

mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target nonblack creature.
mainBoard.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

foreignData.name: 忌まわしい最期
foreignData.text: 黒でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。それのコントローラーは２点のライフを失う。

mainBoard.name: Hideous End
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

rulings.text: If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Hideous End resolves, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. No one loses life.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

foreignData.flavorText: 闇が穢れた仕事を行うとき、送り込んでくるのは手先ばかりとは限らない。
foreignData.name: 堕落の触手
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。堕落の触手はそれにＸ点のダメージを与え、あなたはＸ点のライフを得る。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする沼の総数に等しい。

mainBoard.name: Tendrils of Corruption
mainBoard.originalText: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

rulings.text: The amount of life you gain is equal to the number of Swamps you control, not the amount of damage Tendrils of Corruption deals (in case some of it is prevented).
If the targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Tendrils of Corruption would resolve, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain any life.

mainBoard.text: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

foreignData.name: 墓所王の探索
foreignData.text:
クリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、あなたは墓所王の探索の上に探索カウンターを１個置いてもよい。
墓所王の探索の上から探索カウンターを３個取り除くとともにこれを生け贄に捧げる：黒の５/５のゾンビ・巨人・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。

mainBoard.name: Quest for the Gravelord
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Put a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Quest for the Gravelord’s first ability triggers regardless of who controlled the creature and whose graveyard it was put into.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

foreignData.name: 過去の過ち
foreignData.text:
クリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
{4}{B}：各対戦相手はそれぞれ２点のライフを失い、あなたは２点のライフを得る。この能力は、あなたの墓地にクリーチャー・カードが４枚以上あるときにのみ起動できる。

mainBoard.name: Shadows of the Past
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate this ability only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Once you legally activate the last ability, it doesn’t matter how many creature cards are in your graveyard as it resolves.

mainBoard.text:
Whenever a creature dies, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{4}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Activate this ability only if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

foreignData.flavorText: 悪魔との契約が墓場で終わることは滅多にない。
foreignData.name: 不浄の契約
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーが死亡したとき、そのカードをあなたのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

mainBoard.name: Unhallowed Pact
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

rulings.text: The card will return to the battlefield under your control only if it’s still in the graveyard when Unhallowed Pact’s ability resolves. If it’s not (perhaps because an ability like undying has already returned it to the battlefield), nothing happens.
If Unhallowed Pact is enchanting a token creature, that creature can’t return to the battlefield.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

foreignData.name: ヒル溜りの沼
foreignData.text:
（{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{B}を加える。）
ヒル溜りの沼はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{B}, {T}：各対戦相手はそれぞれ１点のライフを失う。この能力は、あなたが黒のパーマネントを２つ以上コントロールしているときにのみ起動できる。

mainBoard.name: Leechridden Swamp
mainBoard.originalText:
({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)
Leechridden Swamp enters the battlefield tapped.
{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more black permanents.
